Summary: saw strange lights in the sky
divs: Sighting Detailssaw lights for the second day in a row. this is our third time seeing them in total in my life...the first time was in 2002 I believe near the dump here in Brantford, however each time has had differences in colour, shape and speed. it was frightening to observe and disappeared from sight after a few minutes.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Brantford
There was one other sighting in Brantford on or around July 12th 2013
